price: 我以你的语言，使《古兰经》成为容易的，只为要你借它向敬畏者报喜，并警告强辩的民众。
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرۡنَٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا لُّدّٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā yassarnāhu bilisānika litubashira bihi al-mutaqīna watundhira bihi qawman luddan
translations: that you may give glad tidings
